“there are all kinds of courage,” said dumbledore, smiling. “it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.”

summary: Okay but a Worth It style show in the Harry Potter world where they compare Muggle restaurants, Wizarding restaurants, and...
body:
Okay but a Worth It style show in the Harry Potter world where they compare Muggle restaurants, Wizarding restaurants, and fusion restaurants (mostly run by Muggleborns) to see which make the best of a certain food.

The hosts are a muggleborn and a pureblood. The camera person is the Muggleborn’s actual Muggle sibling who has the best deadpan face. There is still for some reason a lot of unnecessary gold on food involved.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: As a teacher, who survived traumatic experiences, seen her loved ones die, who has a coctail of mental ilnesses, I can say, with...
body:
As a teacher, who survived traumatic experiences, seen her loved ones die, who has a coctail of mental ilnesses, I can say, with no fear, doubt or anything else - Severus Snape was an abusive teacher and he had NO reason nor RIGHT to behave the way he did. Also how Dumbledore LET him teach is absurd…well he too wasn’t a great role model, was he?


My experiences - made me who I am. I CAN guide my students, teach them, love them even more, than ever before. I would NEVER do what he did to CHILDREN…

If I had to pick a teacher to love it would be Remus Lupin, Neville Longbottom and (at least what I hoped he would become) Harry Potter.

If I had to pick a teacher to love it would be Remus Lupin, Neville Longbottom and (at least what I hoped he would become) Harry Potter.

Also how Dumbledore LET him teach is absurd…well he too wasn’t a great role model, was he?


My experiences - made me who I am. I CAN guide my students, teach them, love them even more, than ever before. I would NEVER do what he did to CHILDREN…

If I had to pick a teacher to love it would be Remus Lupin, Neville Longbottom and (at least what I hoped he would become) Harry Potter.

Also how Dumbledore LET him teach is absurd…well he too wasn’t a great role model, was he?


My experiences - made me who I am. I CAN guide my students, teach them, love them even more, than ever before. I would NEVER do what he did to CHILDREN…

If I had to pick a teacher to love it would be Remus Lupin, Neville Longbottom and (at least what I hoped he would become) Harry Potter.

blog.name: maudlinrpg
blog.title: Maudlin - RPG
blog.description:
The wizarding community is divided. The Ministry organizes the one year anniversary of the end of the War, but those that fought it from either side are prosecuted and any acts of war punishable with an Azkaban sentence. The whereabouts of the chosen one are unknown and the Order is scattered as their leader roots in prison. After the purge that swept through the Ministry and the humiliation that came with so many convictions from within, the remaining bureaucrats cobbled together an image of normalcy. Order members and Death Eaters alike, who did not give up the fight, are being hunted while they strive for the truth.
Could their Messiah really be vanquished that easily?
Could their leader as easily vanquish the darkest wizard that ever lived?
The Ministry wants a peaceful celebration, but the weapons are still being polished.

summary:
Bellatrix Lestrange  Voldemort’s right hand woman, warrior, disobedient wife and highly dangerous.
 Bellatrix served her master...
caption:
Bellatrix Lestrange

Voldemort’s right hand woman, warrior, disobedient wife and highly dangerous.

Bellatrix served her master loyally even after his presumed demise. She didn’t cease her search and work for him being aware that her Lord could not be killed as easily.

Azkaban may be her home at the moment, but not for long as plans are being drafted and schemes organized from within the Ministry itself, for a mass breakout.

The Longbottom’s may have matched her wrath with their convictions, but they’re savior could not be protected forever, not while she has the determination to pluck the weed and destroy it before it spreads.

blog.name: injuries-in-dust
blog.title: Remembering The Unforgettable
blog.description:
"Write your injuries in dust, your benefits in marble.”
- Benjamin Franklin.
~
Pottermore Username: NimbusStrike69
~
Name is Adam. British. Wiccan.

For years I have struggled to cope with depression and self-injury. I'm not entirely free but I think that I'm better than I used to be. Good days and bad ones.
I'm a writer of fantasy novels. I'm currently working on my seventh.
While none of the others have been published yet this does not stop me writing. 

I love all things sci/fi and fantasy. 
Love Stephen King and Terry Pratchett, Agatha Christie, Michael Chrichton, along with a large variety of other authors.
